title: Private Clinic in Mexico is Expanding The New Frontier in Medicine with Peptide and Protein Therapeutics - Offering Non-Toxic, Natural Treatments for Alzheimer's, Arthritis, and More
text:
RC Therapy
PUERTO PENASCO, Mexico , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Regenerative Cellular Therapy (RCT), a new clinic in Puerto Penasco, Sonora, Mexico , is changing the course of major diseases like Alzheimer's and arthritis through the transformative power of natural peptide-based therapies. Different from traditional drugs, peptides occur naturally in the body. RCT's proprietary therapies work by stimulating the body's innate repair response – unleashing its intrinsic ability to heal itself. Peptide therapeutics can also be highly personalized, allowing RCT to design each treatment to a patient's specific needs. Through the careful administration of these customized peptide therapies, RCT has demonstrated the ability to modify the course of a diverse range of diseases; from neurological diseases like Alzheimer's, brain injury, and dementia, to rheumatic conditions like arthritis and lupus. Patients from all over the world have traveled to RCT's clinic, and given powerful testimony to the impact of RCT's pioneering approach to medicine.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150922/269607
Peptide and Protein Therapy has deep roots at RCT. Building on research that began over 30 years ago, RCT continues to refine and optimize these remarkable therapies. Acting as chemical "messengers," peptides communicate with our DNA, telling it to create proteins in the body that can facilitate natural healing. At RCT's state-of-the-art facility, a multi-step, ultra-purification process is used to isolate an exclusive combination of peptides and proteins for every patient, based on a careful assessment of his or her needs. These personalized treatments then target and actually change the disease process to prevent further deterioration, while simultaneously stimulating the body's own repair mechanisms – all without toxic side effects. Patients that respond well have experienced striking remissions from autoimmune conditions and various forms of cancer, as well as dramatic improvements for a spectrum of neurological disorders, including a significant increase in the cognitive function of advanced Alzheimer's patients.
" Encountering a serious illness is a life altering event and is often met with uncertainty and unease about the future. RCT is diligently working to give patients the treatment their body needs to move forward," said Dr. Donese Worden , Advisor at RC Therapy. "The facility provides leading-edge technology and therapies to assist in the healing process, and the entire staff is committed to helping patients in all aspects of their health."
The team of doctors at RCT believes in the body's own capacity to heal, and the importance of caring for the needs of each individual patient. Led by Chief Executive Officer Hans Truesdell , the clinic's renowned team features an impressive staff of doctors, including:
Donese Worden , NMD, is a renowned physician and global health educator at the forefront of integrated, naturopathic medicine. She is passionate about educating people on taking charge of their health using the best from both conventional and natural medicine. In addition to being a licensed primary care physician, she serves as an adjunct faculty member and lecturer at major universities, is a sought-after keynote speaker and media guest on medical topics, and is a member of many professional organizations, including the International Organization of Integrative Cancer Physicians and the Society of Integrative Oncology. Dr. Carmen Huerta , MD/MS, has been a health care leader for more than 20 years, focusing her career on providing care for patients with chronic degenerative illnesses using alternative treatments. Dr. Huerta worked for the Secretary of the Department of Health of Mexico for 15 years, and for the Indian National Institute's Department of Health and Social Welfare, as a surgeon at the University of Guadalajara , and was Head Physician of the San Carlos Clinic. RCT's clinic is based in Sonora, Mexico within the Bella Sirena Resort, just one hour from the US border in Arizona . During a time of uncertainty and stress, the tranquil setting of this resort is designed to bring comfort and reassurance to a patient during their visit. The facility provides the staff with the best of medical technology and the preeminent tools needed to treat patients while away from the comfort of their own home.
For more information about the treatments, staff, facility and patient testimonials, please visit www.rctherapy.com .
About RCT:
RCT is a clinic leading the medical world with natural, individualized approaches to treat serious illnesses and diseases such as cancer, Alzheimer's, dementia, rheumatoid arthritis and other chronic degenerative diseases. RC Therapy is set in the beautiful resort of Bella Sirena Resort in Sonora, Mexico just one hour from the US border in Arizona , and is led by a team of renowned physicians and researchers from the United States and Mexico .
